body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Parker Automotive Customer Support. My name is Michael Parker. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Dorothy. Can you provide me with your phone number, one zero zero two three four five six seven?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Dorothy. Also, may I have your email address, dcox@example.com?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is dcox@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information, Dorothy. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about my recent billing statement. It seems to be incorrect.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Dorothy. Let me investigate that for you. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Dorothy. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out to us again. Have a great day!
